pr_title: motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

timeline.message:
motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.

motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.

timeline.body:
```suggestion
		if (!plugin.isInMlm() || !config.showBrokenStruts())
```
This is faster and doesn't require keeping the showBrokenStruts config in the config cache.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
if (!config.showBrokenStruts() || !plugin.isInMlm())
if (!plugin.isInMlm() || !config.showBrokenStruts())

This is faster and doesn't require keeping the showBrokenStruts config in the config cache.

timeline.message:
motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts

When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.

timeline.body:
`gameObject` is only used once now. Change this to

```java
addGameObject(event.getGameObject());
```
timeline.bodyText:
gameObject is only used once now. Change this to
addGameObject(event.getGameObject());
timeline.bodyHTML:
gameObject is only used once now. Change this to

addGameObject(event.getGameObject());
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyHTML:
gameObject is unused here.

Suggested change
GameObject gameObject = event.getGameObject();
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.body: You could probably just rename the RocksOverlay to `MotherlodeSceneOverlay` and then put this in there aswell since it looks very similar.

if (ROCK_OBSTACLES.contains(gameObject.getId()))
{
rocks.remove(gameObject);
}
if (BROKEN_STRUT == gameObject.getId())
{
brokenStruts.remove(gameObject);
}
